definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

sentences.english: Interest, attention and drive are all expressions of libido.
sentences.chinese: 兴趣，注意力及欲望驱力，都是力比多的表达。

sentences.english: Libido is an expression taken from the theory of the emotions.
sentences.chinese: 力比多是从情绪理论中借用来的一个语词。

sentences.english: Libido can be transformed or displaced but not destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 力比多能够被转换及被替代，但是不会被毁灭。

sentences.english: The libidinal is the animal part.
sentences.chinese: 力比多的是兽性的那部分。

sentences.english: Resupplying limited testosterone restores libido and muscle mass.
sentences.chinese: 再次注入少量的睾丸激素能恢复力比多和肌肉。

sentences.english: In this sense, the antonym of libido is destrudo.
sentences.chinese: 在这个意义上，力比多的反义词是死亡本能。

definition: Floyd (name)/Freud (name)/Dr Sigmund Freud (1856-1939), the founder of psychoanalysis
Floyd (name)/Freud (name)/Dr Sigmund Freud (1856-1939), the founder of psychoanalysis

pinyin: E2 di3 pu3 si1 qing2 jie2
